questions.title: Where are we? When are we?
questions.tip: You mean we're in the future?
options: Broadway, New York, at 7:09 pm, on Tuesday, December 7st, 2017
Hill Valley, California, at 4:29 pm, on Wednesday, October 21st, 2015
Miami, Florida, at 1:03 am, on Sunday, May 4th, 2014
Los Angeles, California, at 3:45 am, on Friday, April 14th, 2016
Dallas, Texas, at 7:18 pm, on Saturday, June 1st, 2018

questions.title: Doc... what if we don't succeed?
questions.tip: What about Jennifer? What about Einstein? We can't just leave 'em here
options: Ah, no matter. You'll find another one

questions.title: What idiot dressed you in that outfit?
options: I agree. My wife has a bad taste
Emm.. I'm just from the 2015's shopping.. Nevermind
